summary: Replaces the loading screen spider with the loading screen dog.
descriptionHtml:
IMPORTANT:

If you\'re looking for a mod that gets rid of spiders check out this mod:

No Spiders
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=28

It also replaces the spider loading screen with a bear so you don\'t need this one.

If however you prefer dogs in your loading screens or don\'t mind spiders in game but don\'t want to stare at a loading screen with a big fat spider you can use the \"No Loading Screen Spider\" to swap models. 

Description
===========

Replaces the loading screen spider with the loading screen dog.

Install
=======

Extract this archive to any folder and then copy the files to the Data folder.

Uninstall
=========

Delete the mesh from the data\\meshes\\loadingscreenart folder.

Credits
=======

Thanks to Bethesda for another great game and thanks to the TESNexus for being so awesome.
author: Shantih
